CRITICAL_CLARIFICATION.issue: Base column names vs actual training file features

resolution.description_base: Unique column names across all 6,069 BigQuery tables (e.g., agg_mean_45)
resolution.description_actual: Actual feature columns after merge with table suffixes (e.g., agg_mean_45_bqx_eurusd, agg_mean_45_idx_eurusd)
